mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id, case when a.account_level='강사' then t.teacher_name END teacher_name, case when a.account_level='학생' then s.student_name END student_name, a.account_level, a.account_state FROM account a, teacher t, student s WHERE account_id = teacher_id OR account_id = student_id AND account_level IN ('학생','강사') GROUP BY account_id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM account WHERE account_level IN ('학생','강사') AND account_state = '활성화'

SELECT a.account_id, case when a.account_level='강사' then t.teacher_name END teacher_name, case when a.account_level='학생' then s.student_name END student_name, a.account_level, a.account_state FROM account a, teacher t, student s WHERE (account_id = teacher_id OR account_id = student_id) AND account_level = #{searchLevel} GROUP BY account_id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM account WHERE account_level = #{searchLevel} AND account_state = '활성화'

SELECT a.account_id, case when a.account_level='강사' then t.teacher_name END teacher_name, case when a.account_level='학생' then s.student_name END student_name, a.account_level, a.account_state FROM account a, teacher t, student s WHERE account_id = teacher_id OR account_id = student_id AND account_level IN ('학생','강사') AND teacher_name = #{searchName} OR student_name = #{searchName} GROUP BY account_id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
